commit.message:
Merge branch 'feature/structure-prediction' into develop/1.0

* feature/structure-prediction:
  Added xmi output of test data
  including surface again
  We now merge subsequent Speech annotations into one
  Added component to merge multiple subsequent Speech annotations (if not separated by a stage direction)
  BiesoChunking instead of BIOChunking
  We now exclude token surface
  Fixed relative position feature
  Removed NGram feature
  additional features
  Fixed view handling #26
  XMI files for development set
  Evaluation main class #26
  The core annotator component
  We need tokens #26
  Added Act and Scene headings #26
  TEI files (randomly selected) #26
  main class #26
  Convert code #26
  Added type system for text layer
